sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSEVENTREG where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

insert into LNSEVENTREG (TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, TXNSEQ, BILLTRANDATE, BILLSERSEQNO, BILLTXNSEQ, EVENTCODE, BRC, TELLER, RECEIPTNO, ACCTSTAT, MERCHANTNO, CUSTTYPE, PRDCODE, TORECEIPTNO, TOACCTSTAT, TOMERCHANTNO, TOCUSTTYPE, TOPRDCODE, CCY, TRANAMT, TRANCODE, SUBTRANCODE, BRIEFCODE, TRANBRIEF, AMT1, AMT2, AMT3, AMT4, AMT5, BANKCHANNEL, INVESTEE, INVESTMODE, CHANNELTYPE, FUNDCHANNEL, OUTSERIALNO, OTHERFEETYPE, CHTYPE, PRODUCTCODE, SENDFLAG, SENDNUM, TIMESTAMP, TUNNELDATA, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5) values (:trandate, :serseqno, :txnseq, :billtrandate, :billserseqno, :billtxnseq, :eventcode, :brc, :teller, :receiptno, :acctstat, :merchantno, :custtype, :prdcode, :toreceiptno, :toacctstat, :tomerchantno, :tocusttype, :toprdcode, :ccy, :tranamt, :trancode, :subtrancode, :briefcode, :tranbrief, :amt1, :amt2, :amt3, :amt4, :amt5, :bankchannel, :investee, :investmode, :channeltype, :fundchannel, :outserialno, :otherfeetype, :chtype, :productcode, :sendflag, :sendnum, current timestamp, :tunneldata, :reserv1, :reserv2, :reserv3, :reserv4, :reserv5)

update LNSEVENTREG set BILLTRANDATE = :billtrandate, BILLSERSEQNO = :billserseqno, BILLTXNSEQ = :billtxnseq, EVENTCODE = :eventcode, BRC = :brc, TELLER = :teller, RECEIPTNO = :receiptno, ACCTSTAT = :acctstat, MERCHANTNO = :merchantno, CUSTTYPE = :custtype, PRDCODE = :prdcode, TORECEIPTNO = :toreceiptno, TOACCTSTAT = :toacctstat, TOMERCHANTNO = :tomerchantno, TOCUSTTYPE = :tocusttype, TOPRDCODE = :toprdcode, CCY = :ccy, TRANAMT = :tranamt, TRANCODE = :trancode, SUBTRANCODE = :subtrancode, BRIEFCODE = :briefcode, TRANBRIEF = :tranbrief, AMT1 = :amt1, AMT2 = :amt2, AMT3 = :amt3, AMT4 = :amt4, AMT5 = :amt5, BANKCHANNEL = :bankchannel, INVESTEE = :investee, INVESTMODE = :investmode, CHANNELTYPE = :channeltype, FUNDCHANNEL = :fundchannel, OUTSERIALNO = :outserialno, OTHERFEETYPE = :otherfeetype, CHTYPE = :chtype, PRODUCTCODE = :productcode, SENDFLAG = :sendflag, SENDNUM = :sendnum, TIMESTAMP = current timestamp, TUNNELDATA = :tunneldata, RESERV1 = :reserv1, RESERV2 = :reserv2, RESERV3 = :reserv3, RESERV4 = :reserv4, RESERV5 = :reserv5 where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

select TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, TXNSEQ, BILLTRANDATE, BILLSERSEQNO, BILLTXNSEQ, EVENTCODE, BRC, TELLER, RECEIPTNO, ACCTSTAT, MERCHANTNO, CUSTTYPE, PRDCODE, TORECEIPTNO, TOACCTSTAT, TOMERCHANTNO, TOCUSTTYPE, TOPRDCODE, CCY, TRANAMT, TRANCODE, SUBTRANCODE, BRIEFCODE, TRANBRIEF, AMT1, AMT2, AMT3, AMT4, AMT5, BANKCHANNEL, INVESTEE, INVESTMODE, CHANNELTYPE, FUNDCHANNEL, OUTSERIALNO, OTHERFEETYPE, CHTYPE, PRODUCTCODE, SENDFLAG, SENDNUM, TIMESTAMP, TUNNELDATA, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5 from LNSEVENTREG where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq
